name: Bad Burglar Simulator
description:
This is a simple simulation where you need to be a burglar and steal a cargo silently, but the thing is we're bad at making games...sooo it might be harder than it's supposed to so good luck :D

Instructions :

A/D = Wobble Left/Wobble Right

Cursor and LeftClick RightClick = Aim  and Grab + Hold Left Hand Right Hand

Space = Jump

R = Restart Level

Don't make too much noise. If you do you will die restart the level
